sentences.english: The material choice of triple junction high-efficiency solar cells.

sentences.english: In this paper, a new designing method lor terrestrial use solar cell power system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了太陽電池發電系統的一種設計新方法。

sentences.english: The spectral response measurements for crystalline silicon solar cells were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 並對晶體硅太陽電池光譜響應進行了實際測量。

sentences.english: It also shows the characteristics of double-junction solar cell manufactured by the technology.

sentences.english: This paper describes the experiment and the results of the buried contact silicon solar cells with mechanical grooving.

sentences.english: The present invention relates to aluminum-based-silicon-particle solar cell and its processing method.

sentences.english: The characters of the selective emitter solar cell structure are described in this paper.
